attributes.action: Cat rescues need government funding and new laws are needed.
attributes.additional_details:
100s and 1000s of cats are being abandoned and left to die on the streets. More animals are being un-neutered/spayed. These animals are wild - fighting and breeding out of control. 

Rescues are seeing their vets bills and food/litter and medicine costs are increasing while they try to help these cats.

Its time to give rescues funding to help them try control the issue of stray cats - its time to make neutering/spaying and chipping cats compulsary. Its time to educate people more on pet care.
attributes.background: Cat rescues are struggling desperately - the government hasnt helped them at all during the pandemic and all their fundraising events have been cancelled. Rescues rely on these events to give them money for food/litter/vets and medicines. The amount of cats needing help has increased tenfold.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308733

We're not sure what laws you'd like to be changed. You could start a new petition setting out what you'd like to happen.
